name: Break Down
description:
Let's face it, we all know this game. We've probably all made this game. You move a paddle, the paddle bounces ball, the ball breaks bricks, points fall out. Your grandmother probably played this game. You know exactly what to expect.

Why did I upload this game, then? And why did I tag it for a horror game jam? I have no idea. I'm not sure I did. Maybe the game uploaded itself.

Move the paddle with the mouse. Escape to quit game. That's about it.
